title: Not sure if bug at this point.
body: I'm posting this because I'm at a loss at this point and have no idea what to do. My main account has its email and password changed all of a sudden. It happened before even though my computer seemed completely secure, but still kept happening to the point where i was warned Riot wouldn't help again. I asked them to lock my account if the email was changed so at least there is that. I had logged into it no problem 3 hours ago, used a $25 gamecard, and logged off. Now I can't and I don't know what to do with it anymore. Already posted a ticket to Riot but I doubt anything can come of it since I was warned. I came here to see if anyone had any idea if this is a bug or if i'm just hacked and unable to get it back.

replies.body: I couldn't say for sure what could be causing your account to be accessed by an unauthorized user, but I suggest going over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for some important safety practices.  It's really important that you go over this to make sure that you have any accounts outside of league secured as well.   It's good that you put in a ticket so our account team can help out!  It may a bit for a response depending on the queue, hang tight!
